description: Did you know MasterFoods™ Tartare Sauce makes a great salad dressing. Give it a go with this light and fresh salad. Perfect for a hot summer’s day.
keywords: Chicken salad,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Chicken,Dairy free
name: Fresh Chicken & Avocado Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Steam chicken breasts whole and allow to cool.
On a platter lay down the wild rocket.
Slice the chicken into serving slices and lay out on the platter. Top with avocado slices.
Mix MasterFoodsTM Tartare Sauce with lemon juice and drizzle over the salad.
Complete the dish with onions, capers and parsley sprigs.
